title: What Makes a Room Unforgettable?
description: Ask the founders of Roman and Williams, who for two decades have designed homes, hotels, restaurants, clubs, galleries, stores, furniture — even birdhouses — bathed in a luxe patina.
category: Roman and Williams Buildings and Interiors
media:credit: Landon Speers for The New York Times
media:description: The Roman and Williams founders Stephen Alesch and Robin Standefer pivoted to interior design after working on films. “The stars and producers on these movie sets said, ‘Why don’t our houses look as good as the movie sets?’” she said.
